conversion_verification.notes: The conversion successfully depicts an isometric cutaway model with clear structural depth.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation with clear wall thickness, floor separation, and consistent isometric perspective.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly accurate layout fidelity. Most rooms and internal partitions align with the 2D source, though some small utility/toilet spaces are simplified.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture sets (dining, living, beds) are present and correctly placed, though some bathroom/kitchen fixtures are represented as simple volumes.

visual_clarity.notes: Clear rendering with good lighting; some textures appear slightly soft/blurred but geometry remains readable.

detected_errors.description: Minor simplification of window and balcony glass materials compared to partition lines in 2D.
Specific bathroom fixture detail is simplified into general blocks.

summary: A highly successful 3D conversion that maintains strong geometric fidelity to the original floor plan layout and proportions.
